title: Saints Aimo and Vermondo Standing on the Roof of the House of One of the Monastery's Enemies and Threatening to Burn it Down with Torches
description: Saints Aimo and Vermondo Standing on the Roof of the House of One of the Monastery's Enemies and Threatening to Burn it Down with Torches; Attributed to Anovelo da Imbonate (Italian (Lombard), active about 1400); Milan, Lombardia, Italy; about 1400; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 25.6 x 18.4 cm (10 1/16 x 7 1/4 in.); Ms. 26, fol. 10; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
